header.gameNote: STATE FARM SUN BOWL TOURNAMENT AT EL PASO TX

article.headline: Drake 71, Jackson State 70
article.story: EL PASO Texas (AP) -- Ajay Calvin scored 19 points and Drake survived an errant 3-point shot in the final seconds to defeat Jackson State 71-70 in the championship of the Sun Bowl Tournament on Saturday night. The Bulldogs (9-2) led 71-68 when Trey Johnson shot a 3-pointer with about two seconds left. It bounced off the rim and was tipped in at the buzzer by Grant Maxey for two harmless points. Calvin made 9-of-13 field goals and grabbed a team-high eight rebounds. Jonathan Cox came off the bench to score 12 points and grab eight rebounds, including six on the offensive end. Johnson, who missed all seven of his 3-point attempts, led Jackson State (6-7) with 17 points. Jeremy Caldwell finished with 13 points and nine rebounds, while Maxey added 13 points and eight boards. Both teams struggled from beyond the 3-point arc. Drake connected on 2-of-13 attempts, while Jackson State was 4-of-21.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
